attributes.action: Buy a Chocolate Egg and save the world!... create Egg Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Easter usually inspires people to be more giving and thoughful to others. To keep this spirit going all year round, I propose it is made mandatory to buy and give a egg away every day! This should sort the worlds global, inspire goodwill in the developed world and help the developing world through fair trade chocolate buys.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
